document_data.name: Hyustus Staget
document_data.mainbody:
'''Hyustus Staget''' ({{Pronounce|HEW|stus|_|STAG|it|refs=}}) was a captain of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] 
in the [[Dock Ward of Waterdeep|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Staget kept peace in the Dock Ward.
document_data.History: Around [[1491 DR]], Captain Staget was investigating a gang war between the [[Zhentarim]] and the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]]. Staget was leading an operation to capture the high-ranking [[Zhent]] [[Urstul Floxin]] when he and his men were called to an abandoned warehouse that turned out to be a secret Zhent hideout. There he discovered some adventurers and [[Renaer Neverember]].
document_data.Personality: Staget truly believed in his work to protect the good people of the Dock Ward. He did not care if the Zhentarim and Xanathar minions killed each other.
document_data.Relationships: Staget was known and even appreciated by every shopkeeper, guild member, innkeeper, and tavern keeper in the Dock Ward.
